name: Portfolio
description: This is the repository for this portfolio site. This has gone through multiple iterations, but this is the only one I've made public.

name: Mealify
description: Mealify is a recipe sharing application that allows users to share, discover, and enjoy a variety of recipes. It's built using Java, React, Spring Boot, and MySQL.
